Entry.de-DE: Ich habe auf meine Berater gehört
Das Zikkurat des Mondgottes Nanna gesichert
Das Zikkurat des Mondgottes Nanna verbessert
Das Zikkurat des Mondgottes Nanna restauriert und studiert
Das Zikkurat des Mondgottes Nanna verbessert
Replaced ancient text with my sigil
Zerstörte eine seltsame und gefährliche Schriftrolle
Appropriated the culture of a vanquished tribe
Vanquished a tribe and had no regrets
Vanquished a tribe (to which my spouse happened to belong)
Purged the land of a Tribe
Allowed a family to dictate the laws
Changed my mind after establishing a law
Ich weigerte mich meine Gesetze zu ändern
Ich verweigerte Frieden im Ausstausch für ein Geschenk
Vowed to never pay tribute to Assyria
Ongoing Exchange of Ideas With Persia
Vowed to destroy the entire Roman civilization
Eine römische Stadt erobert, danach Frieden akzeptiert
Geweigert sich Rom zu beugen, selbst nach dem Sie eine unserer Stadt erobert haben
Sich Rom gebeugt, nach dem Sie eine unserer Stadt erobert haben
Talked Persia out of requiring Tribute for Peace
Talked Babylon into a Peace deal
Our pride has led to peace
Rejected Assyria's Peace Offer in the boldest way
Joined a plot to kill a visiting ruler
Called in a Favor to get a hunting party released
Tactician Leader inspired our people to War!
We trained Ranged units to prepare for War
We trained Melee units to prepare for War
Deployed Mounted units in preparation for War
Recruited new Melee units in preparation for War
Organized special Mounted units in preparation for War
Negotiated peace and an extradition treaty
Delivered justice in international criminal cases
Failed to ensure that our accused would get fair trials
Pardoned our citizens of crimes against foreigners
Delivered justice in cases involving a neighboring nation
Allowed another nation to put our citizens on trial
Forged Peace with an agitated Nation
Avoided conflict by sharing our knowledge
Avoided a war by striking up a research agreement
Did not make our enemies pay
We built a Granary for a Nation who had Food struggles
Intimidated a foe who had been preparing to attack us
We calmed down an angry Nation through diplomacy
Tied up an angry Nation in diplomatic knots to delay a War
Spent big to turn a burgeoning adversary into a Peace partner
Our grand religious mission to another Nation was a big success
Ich habe es so gewollt, allem Anschein nach
Geweigert Technologie an ein fremdes Reich zu geben
Warned heir of falling in love with a foreigner
Schickte Spione welche gefasst und exekutiert wurden
Wehrte sich gegen korruptes Religions Oberhaupt
Geweigert mit einem neuen Herrscher zu handeln
Erkannte Frieden des neuen Herrschers an
Went to war to avenge an insult
Ignored insult from a proud ruler
Refused to be snubbed by new leader
Geweigert mit neuem Herrscher zu verhandeln
Sagte einem anderen Oberhaupt er sei mehr gesegnet als unserer
Celebrations for the birth of my Heir
Laughed in the face of danger
I declared war on a conspiring nation
Ich habe einen Barbar zum Vertrauen gemacht
Guckte zu, wie eine eroberte Stadt brannte
Kept rival barbarians from seizing land
Made an example of enemy city's leadership
Starb in der Schlacht weil geweigert sich zurückzuziehen
Heir returned from elopement in disgrace
Added questionable relative to my court
My reign is bigger than literature
Ich habe meinen Sohn als Erben entfernt
Ich nahm an der Wilden Jagd teil
Ich habe mich der Wilden Jadg verweigert
I took over a minister's role on the council
Imprisoned those who wished to curb my power
I made peace with my rivals
Made concessions to a disloyal Family
Installed a Steward of the Chamber
I gilded my halls with imported marble
All must respect the same laws
Disapproved of my dead child's behavior
Stayed in city while spouse mourned
Refused a biography of my life
Allow rival to influnce our child
Could not decide between child and courtier
Forced to send away my lover
Caved to demands for special recognition
Faced charges of wickedness in court
Begged for a foreign ruler's forgiveness
Left the heir's fate to chance
Did not participate in wild revels (but really did)
Gave vengeful courtier a second chance
Returned with stories of my authority
Brought a strange mystic to court
My renown grows... by supenatural means
Insulted foreign ruler on wedding day
Insisted that royal heir return to court
Would not accept blame for barbarian incident
Ruler refused to punish rightful heir
Did not seek revenge on tribal ruler
We did not prosecute the murder of a royal bastard
Refused to cowar before a conspiracy
Reacted a bit too fearfully to a conspiracy
The people look to me for divine guidance
Helped your people after a forest fire
Invited forest fire orphan to your Court
Forest fire orphan became a Scribe
Geweigert ein antikes Grab zu ehren
Decreed an ancient tomb to be a Monument
Made noble creature a symbol of our nation
Personally trained a cohort of link(PROJECT_GLADIATORS)
Geweiger sich den Heiden zu beugen
Donated embers for a sacred fire
Refused embers for a sacred fire
Cast out child from the river
Accepted the title Defender of the Faith
Commissioned an epic poem about Dragons
I sit alone on the high throne
I built myself a grand Mausoleum
Refused to permit a foreign faith
Relied on a Tribe to smuggle spies
Bowed to pressure for political reform
Used the state to protect a religion
Did not mix politics and religion
My armies fight for me, not a god
Sentence mutinous general to short prison term
Refused to bow to foreign pressure
Made a fool of myself at a banquet
Kämpfte um Korruption ein Ende zu setzen
Refused to honor one ruler above all
Gave away our share of the spoils
Named a new calendar after oneself
A memorable feast was thrown in your honor
A terrible feast was thrown in your honor
Dealt with a corrupt member of a family
Made an example of a traitorous subject
Repaired damage caused by the murderer
Charmed our neighbors in a diplomatic mediation
Centralized religion into the worship of Aten
Banned a festival that spoke ill of your nation
Emphasized nation as the true followers of the faith
Personally led coming of age ceremonies
Led a family to the light
Failed to deal with foreign hostages
Allowed other families to sponsor religious events
Prevented other families from sponsoring religious events
Making large changes to the nation
Wählte Tot über gezwungen zu werden
Erlangt den Ruf eines närrischen Säufers
Made a deal with the rebel slaves
Made a deal with the rebel slaves
